sub_title: Student MSc International Management & student MSc Strategic Management: Entrepreneurship at Tilburg University | Business | Strategy | Technology | Result-driven
summary:
Fueled by ambition, devoted to achieving excellence with keen attention to detail, and a firm believer in the power of collaboration – this is the image I strive to project. Over the past 5 years of my academic journey, I've been nurturing my skills and knowledge to prepare myself for new challenges and to broaden my horizons. My passions encompass technology, business, processes, marketing, and strategy, with a sharp focus on the latest trends and innovations.

Having completed my Bachelor's in Economics & Business Economics at Radboud University, I continued my academic journey in Tilburg. The past 1.5 years saw me further specialize through the pursuit of a Master's in Strategic Management: Entrepreneurship at Tilburg University. This master's emphasis on Management, Strategy, and Business Development aligns seamlessly with my interests. I have since completed the courses in this Master’s in 2023 with a GPA of 7.4, with only my Thesis remaining.

Continuing my academic journey with a strong drive for self-improvement and lifelong learning, I've been pursuing a second Master's degree in International Management at Tilburg University since February 2023. Holding a current GPA of 7.2, I'm actively participating in courses like International Marketing, International Finance, and Consulting Skills, where I'm integrating fresh insights into my existing knowledge.

Over the past year, I had the privilege of interning at ASML's S&SC division. Given my fascination with technology, innovation, and strategy, this was an opportunity I couldn't let slip by. These five months have proven incredibly enriching. Being able to immerse myself in learning, observation, and experiences at a company as passionate and dynamic as ASML has undoubtedly been one of the most captivating chapters of my life.

As the academic year of 2023 progressed, I seized the opportunity to allocate more time to my freelance work, leading to the establishment of a sole proprietorship that underlines my unwavering commitment to delivering quality services. This strategic move aims to elevate my professional standing and underscore my determination for excellence. Looking ahead to the rest of the year, I'm enthusiastic about the prospects unfolding in both my academic pursuits and professional endeavors.

I am continuously seeking opportunities for personal growth, learning, and new experiences as these are my driving force. If I have interested you, Let's connect!

profile_positions.description: In my current role as a versatile Freelancer, I have established a track record of excellence across a range of sectors including but not limited to hospitality, catering, logistics, IT installations, and events. Backed by a consistent 5-star rating across 63 reviews, I showcase adaptability, commitment, and my drive for exceeding expectations. Furthermore, this job has granted me valuable insights into the operational practices of various companies. Given my interest in business operations and processes, these past few months of practical experience have been both very enjoyable and insightful, and have contributed to my overall personal and professional development.
profile_positions.title: Freelancer

profile_positions.description: In my current role as an Exam Tutor at AthenaStudies, I guide small groups of students through focused education aimed at specific bachelor courses that I've personally completed at Radboud University. My enthusiasm for the topics I tutor enables me to adapt the provided material seamlessly and allows for an engaging and interactive environment that empowers students to excel and advance in their academic journey.
profile_positions.title: Exam Tutor

profile_positions.description: As an educator at Lyceo, I've made contributions across 15+ high schools throughout the Netherlands. My diverse roles included providing both private and group tutoring in several subjects, facilitating specialized introductory programs for new high school students, teaching final exam training in subjects like English and economics, supporting as a project class assistant and stepping in as a substitute teacher. My responsibilities allowed me to work with various student group sizes, where I ensured their learning journey and well-being were nurtured. During my much-enjoyed time working at Lyceo, I further refined my teaching, communication, and presentation skills.
profile_positions.title: Educator

profile_positions.description: During my five-month tenure as a scheduler at Lyceo, I actively contributed to coordinating, overseeing, and efficiently fulfilling staffing requirements across a diverse range of services provided by Lyceo in the Eastern region of the country. In this capacity, I collaborated directly with colleagues across various organizational levels, location managers, and educational institutions, helping ensure the continuity of service delivery during the challenging covid-19 period. This temporary job opportunity during my school break significantly enhanced my proficiency in communication, scheduling, client interaction, and managing time-sensitive initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Scheduler

profile_positions.description: During my internship at ASML, I was actively involved in diverse quality-focused projects within the Strategic Sourcing & Supply Chain division. This experience provided invaluable exposure to a dynamic professional business environment. My responsibilities included assisting in the implementation of a new supplier target-setting system, creating training material for a quality dashboard, conducting in-depth data analysis, evaluating processes, suggesting potential improvements, and delivering conclusive presentations regarding my research. I gained working experience in tools such as SAP, TIBCO Spotfire, Excel, PowerPoint, and Word. Throughout this period, I enhanced my skills in data and process analysis, effective communication, presenting, time management, critical thinking, and further advanced my Excel and PowerPoint proficiency.
profile_positions.title: Intern Strategic Sourcing & Supply Chain
